name: Taylor the Warrior Tailor
description:
Explore a forest as Taylor the Warrior Taylor. An expert clothes maker and monster battler. Beware this flowery forest filled with monsters! Collect flowers and monster drops to make expert fashions. The game includes eight monsters to battle and forty eight outfits to create.

This game was created for CU's Game Dev and Graphics club Spring 2023 Game Jam. 

The initial idea of this game came from three randomized icons.
